messages.content:
What do you think of the following text, what categories of answers are there, make a table:
What about work? What does this have to do with my job:
Answers:
Based on a model that was trained on different methods to answer and present information in a structured way
Becomes a partner for thinking
No more jobs :P 
We can know by example what will be the best solution, and we have to learn to ask the right questions
It means that mundane tasks that have been done 1000000x no longer need to be done
Changes how we do our tasks, but not necessarily replaces us?

Table of Categories of Answers:

| Category | Example Answer |
|----------|----------------|
| Clarifying question | What do you mean by "this"? |
| Joke/Humor | No more jobs :P |
| Philosophical/Reflective | Becomes a partner for thinking |
| Opinion/Perspective | It means that mundane tasks that have been done 1000000x no longer need to be done |
| Instructional/Advice | We have to learn to ask the right questions |
| Explaining a concept | Changes how we do our tasks, but not necessarily replaces us |
| Meta-answer | Based on a model that was trained on different methods to answer and present information in a structured way |
